verses.verse: I am the <S%H1397>man<s%> who has <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H6040>affliction<s%> Because of the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of His <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>
He has <S%H5090>driven<s%> me and made me <S%H1980>walk<s%> In <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and not in <S%H216>light.<s%>
<S%H389>Surely<s%> against me He has <S%H2015>turned<s%> His <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H7725>Repeatedly<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
He has caused my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and my <S%H5785>skin<s%> to <S%H1086>waste<s%> <S%H1086>away,<s%> He has <S%H7665>broken<s%> my <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
He has <S%H1129>besieged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> and <S%H5362>encompassed<s%> me with <S%H7219>bitterness<s%> and <S%H8513>hardship.<s%>
In <S%H4285>dark<s%> <S%H4285>places<s%> He has made me <S%H3427>dwell,<s%> Like those who have <S%H5769>long<s%> been <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
He has <S%H1443>walled<s%> [me] in so that I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out; He has <S%H3513>made<s%> my <S%H5178>chain<s%> <S%H3513>heavy.<s%>
<S%H1571>Even<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H2199>cry<s%> out and <S%H7768>call<s%> for <S%H7768>help,<s%> He <S%H9636>shuts<s%> out my <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>
He has <S%H1443>blocked<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%> with <S%H1496>hewn<s%> <S%H1496>stone;<s%> He has <S%H9389>made<s%> my <S%H9350>paths<s%> <S%H9389>crooked.<s%>
He is to me like a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H693>lying<s%> in <S%H693>wait,<s%> [Like] a <S%H9030>lion<s%> in <S%H4565>secret<s%> <S%H4565>places.<s%>
He has <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%> and <S%H6582>torn<s%> me to <S%H6582>pieces;<s%> He has <S%H8074>made<s%> me <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>
He <S%H1869>bent<s%> His <S%H7198>bow<s%> And <S%H5324>set<s%> me as a <S%H4307>target<s%> for the <S%H2671>arrow.<s%>
He made the <S%H1121>arrows<s%> of His <S%H827>quiver<s%> To <S%H935>enter<s%> into my <S%H3629>inward<s%> <S%H3629>parts.<s%>
I have <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H7814>laughingstock<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> Their [mocking] <S%H5058>song<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
He has <S%H7646>filled<s%> me with <S%H4844>bitterness,<s%> He has <S%H7301>made<s%> me <S%H7301>drunk<s%> with <S%H3939>wormwood.<s%>
And He has <S%H1638>broken<s%> my <S%H8127>teeth<s%> with <S%H2687>gravel;<s%> He has made me <S%H3728>cower<s%> in the <S%H665>dust.<s%>
And my <S%H5315>soul<s%> has <S%H2186>been<s%> <S%H2186>rejected<s%> from <S%H7965>peace;<s%> I have <S%H5382>forgotten<s%> <S%H9186>happiness.<s%>
So I <S%H559>say,<s%> "My <S%H5331>strength<s%> has perished, And [so has] my <S%H6>hope<s%> from the <S%H8431>Lord.<s%>"
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and my <S%H4788>wandering,<s%> the <S%H3939>wormwood<s%> and <S%H7219>bitterness.<s%>
<S%H2142>Surely<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2142>remembers<s%> And is <S%H7743>bowed<s%> <S%H7743>down<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me.
<S%H384>This<s%> I <S%H7725>recall<s%> to my <S%H3820>mind,<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H3176>have<s%> <S%H3176>hope.<s%>
The Lord's <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%> <S%H3588>indeed<s%> <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H8552>cease,<s%> For His <S%H7356>compassions<s%> <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3615>fail.<s%>
[They] are <S%H2319>new<s%> every <S%H1242>morning;<s%> <S%H7227>Great<s%> is Thy <S%H530>faithfulness.<s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is my <S%H2506>portion,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H5921>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H3176>have<s%> <S%H3176>hope<s%> in Him."
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to those who <S%H6960>wait<s%> for Him, To the <S%H5315>person<s%> who <S%H1875>seeks<s%> Him.
[It is] <S%H2896>good<s%> that he <S%H3175>waits<s%> <S%H1748>silently<s%> For the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
[It is] <S%H2896>good<s%> for a <S%H1397>man<s%> that he should <S%H5375>bear<s%> The <S%H5923>yoke<s%> in his <S%H5271>youth.<s%>
Let him <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> and be <S%H1826>silent<s%> <S%H3588>Since<s%> He has <S%H5190>laid<s%> [it] on him.
Let him <S%H5414>put<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> <S%H194>Perhaps<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is <S%H8615>hope.<s%>
Let him <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H3895>cheek<s%> to the <S%H5221>smiter;<s%> Let him be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will not <S%H2186>reject<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%>
For <S%H518>if<s%> He <S%H3013>causes<s%> <S%H3013>grief,<s%> Then He will <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> According to His <S%H7230>abundant<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness.<s%>
For He does not <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H4480>willingly,<s%> <S%H3820><s%> Or <S%H3013>grieve<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H376>men.<s%>
To <S%H1792>crush<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> His <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%>
To <S%H5186>deprive<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> of <S%H4941>justice<s%> In the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High,<s%>
To <S%H5791>defraud<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> in his <S%H7379>lawsuit<s%> â€“ Of these things the <S%H136>Lord<s%> does not <S%H7200>approve.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2088>there<s%> who <S%H559>speaks<s%> and it <S%H1961>comes<s%> to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3808>Unless<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> [it]?
[Is it] not from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High<s%> That both <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H9567>ill<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%>?
<S%H4100>Why<s%> should [any] <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H120>mortal,<s%> or [any] <S%H1397>man,<s%> <S%H596>Offer<s%> <S%H596>complaint<s%> in <S%H5921>view<s%> of his <S%H2399>sins<s%>?
Let us <S%H2664>examine<s%> and <S%H2713>probe<s%> our <S%H1870>ways,<s%> And let us <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
We <S%H5375>lift<s%> up our <S%H3824>heart<s%> and <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>Toward<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven;<s%>
We have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> and <S%H4784>rebelled,<s%> Thou hast not <S%H5545>pardoned.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> [Thyself] with <S%H639>anger<s%> And <S%H7291>pursued<s%> us; Thou hast <S%H2026>slain<s%> [and] hast not <S%H2550>spared.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> Thyself with a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H4480>So<s%> that <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H8605>prayer<s%> can <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through.<s%>
[Mere] <S%H5501>offscouring<s%> and <S%H3973>refuse<s%> Thou hast <S%H7760>made<s%> us In the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> our <S%H340>enemies<s%> have <S%H6475>opened<s%> their <S%H6310>mouths<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us.
<S%H6343>Panic<s%> and <S%H6354>pitfall<s%> have <S%H1961>befallen<s%> us, <S%H7612>Devastation<s%> and <S%H7667>destruction;<s%>

My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3381>run<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H6388>streams<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> of the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5064>pour<s%> <S%H5064>down<s%> <S%H3808>unceasingly,<s%> <S%H1820><s%> <S%H369>Without<s%> <S%H2014>stopping,<s%>
<S%H5704>Until<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8259>looks<s%> <S%H8259>down<s%> And <S%H7200>sees<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H9412>bring<s%> <S%H9412>pain<s%> to my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of my <S%H5892>city.<s%>
My <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause<s%> <S%H6679>Hunted<s%> me <S%H6679>down<s%> like a <S%H6833>bird;<s%>
They have <S%H6789>silenced<s%> me in the <S%H953>pit<s%> And have <S%H3034>placed<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> on me.
<S%H4325>Waters<s%> <S%H6687>flowed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H7218>head;<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am <S%H1504>cut<s%> <S%H1504>off!<s%>"
I <S%H7121>called<s%> on Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Out of the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H953>pit.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> "Do not <S%H5956>hide<s%> Thine <S%H241>ear<s%> from my [prayer for] <S%H7309>relief,<s%> From my <S%H7775>cry<s%> for <S%H7775>help.<s%>"
Thou didst <S%H7126>draw<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H3117>when<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> on Thee; Thou didst <S%H559>say,<s%> "Do not <S%H3372>fear!<s%>"
O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> Thou didst <S%H7378>plead<s%> my soul's <S%H7379>cause;<s%> Thou hast <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> my <S%H9132>life.<s%>
O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H5792>oppression;<s%> <S%H8199>Judge<s%> my <S%H4941>case.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5360>vengeance,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> their <S%H4284>schemes<s%> against me.
Thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> their <S%H4284>schemes<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of my <S%H6965>assailants<s%> and their <S%H1902>whispering<s%> [Are] <S%H5921>against<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
<S%H5027>Look<s%> on their <S%H3427>sitting<s%> and their <S%H7012>rising;<s%> I am their <S%H4485>mocking<s%> <S%H4485>song.<s%>
Thou wilt <S%H7725>recompense<s%> <S%H1576><s%> them, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> According to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
Thou wilt <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H4044>hardness<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> Thy <S%H8381>curse<s%> will be on them.
Thou wilt <S%H7291>pursue<s%> them in <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them From <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>
